list.abs: 喜忧参半 mingled hope and fear卫冕世界冠军 reighing world champion下游行业 downsream industry
哑_百度百科 ... 哑炮[ dumb shell] 哑然[ silence reighs] 哑然[ be unable to stifle a laugh].

auth_sentence.content: The pair were found six days later, and Reigh was unharmed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pair were found six days later, and Reigh was unharmed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pair were found six days later, and Reigh was unharmed.

auth_sentence.content: The couple had a child, Reigh, who Rockefeller nicknamed Snooks and insisted on raising and educating single-handedly.
auth_sentence.res_content: The couple had a child, Reigh, who Rockefeller nicknamed Snooks and insisted on raising and educating single-handedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The couple had a child, Reigh, who Rockefeller nicknamed Snooks and insisted on raising and educating single-handedly.

auth_sentence.content: He pushed a social worker to the ground and bundled seven-year-old Reigh into a waiting car last July.
auth_sentence.res_content: He pushed a social worker to the ground and bundled seven-year-old Reigh into a waiting car last July.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He pushed a social worker to the ground and bundled seven-year-old Reigh into a waiting car last July.
